name: Mexican Turnovers
description: These Mexican-inspired turnovers are sure to become a favourite!

ingredients.name: grated low-fat cheese — Monterey Jack or cheddar
Louisiana Seasoning or Cajun Fries Seasoning
Guacamole Dip Mix or Kickin' Jalapeno Burger Seasoning

preparation: Combine flour, butter and cream cheese and form into a smooth dough. Cover or wrap and chill for 1 hour.
Roll out dough on floured surface. Cut circles with a 2" cookie cutter. Top each circle with 1 tsp filling, fold in half and pinch edges together.
Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Brush with egg and coarsely grind Black Pepper overtop. Bake for 20 minutes.
tips: Try 1 tbsp Guacamole Dip Mix instead of Black Pepper for the glaze.
Freeze uncooked turnovers on Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper. Once frozen, place in an airtight container in the freezer. When ready to serve, bake as directed.
Serve with prepared Epicure Salsa for dipping.

products.name: Chili Seasoning (1001136)
summary: Make classic, restaurant-quality chili at home with better-for-you ingredients.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavour with medium heat.

products.name: Louisiana Seasoning (1011503)
summary: A Cajun-inspired seasoning that brings the flavour with a medium-spice level.

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Kickin’ Jalapeño Burger Seasoning
summary: Bring some zing to your burgers with our Kickin' Jalapeño Burger Seasoning, made with select spices and real jalapeño peppers. We made this versatile seasoning to bring spicy umami flavor (with a hint of lime) to anything and everything that we could throw on the BBQ. It's a spicy blend but you can add as much or as little heat as you want to cater to your tastes. Simply combine with your burger meat (or sprinkle on vegetables that have been lightly oiled) for an impressive, healthy alternative to takeout burgers.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
